content.rendered:
Directed by Murari Sinha.

Written by Murari Sinha.

Cast Preeti Jhangiani(Chhathi Maa). Ravi Kishan(Priyavrat).Gurleen Chopra .Rahul Jain. Sheetal Kale(Kajal). Monika Misra(Rani Shatrupa (as Monika Mishra)). Nisha Singh(Kamla). Mohit Tyagi(Mantri)

Language Hindi.

Producers Rajni Ganju. Ruchi Gupta. Nilesh Kumar. Amit Pradhan.

Production Shining Screens.
